title: Project caches bug
body:
I got 4 project caches in my loot but each time I tried to open one of them it shows" crafting failed",this appears the hextech unit has a bad motivator.Please try...blablhabla"
Does anyone could tell me how to fix this? restart the client just doesnt work.

replies.body:
The Project: Disruption First Strike event was scheduled to end on April 16th 2016. Before the event ended, we posted some articles detailing just what was going to happen with any leftover Project crafting materials which you can find [**here**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/ending-soon/first-strike). 

TLDR; you're still able to disenchant any leftover items, but since the event has ended you will not be able to open them for the normal Project loot.

Let me know if you've got any other questions.
